task_description_list.task_description: Create a new project, then import A_cradle.mp4 to the media, drag the video to the timeline, click the "Audio" button to add music to the timeline, and finally export the video.
sub_task_description_list: Click Import button and add A_cradle.mp4 to the media
Drag the video in the media to the timeline
Click Audio button and add a music to the timeline
Click Export button using label ID

task_description_list.task_description: Delete the video frames after five seconds and then before one second in this video, and then export the video.

task_description_list.task_description: Open the first existing project. Switch to Stickers panel. Drag a sticker of a person's face to the video, and then export the video.
